system
Class HardBlock

java.lang.Object
  system.MapObject
      system.NonLivingUnit
          system.HardBlock

public class HardBlock
extends NonLivingUnit

The class HardBlock/code> represents the Hard Block object in bomberman. It extends the class NonLivingUnit and contains one method which creates a hard block and loads an image to match its position.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Brett Leighton, Leotard Niyonkuru, Marc-Andre Cataford, Mete Kemertas, Martin Zhang

Constructor Summary
HardBlock(int x, int y)
          This method takes as input an x and y co-ordinate and places a hard block image at the location.
